item.title: How to change tele buttons
item.dc:creator: @erwinho14 erwinho14
item.description:
@erwinho14 wrote:

hey m8´s how are ya

i got a question: how do i change the coordinates of the buttons like case 168 and 165 (home, train)
cuz if i found the cases in client.java i find this

        case 168:
            if (teleblock == true) { // Made by musicmad441
                sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); 
            } else {
                customCommand("home"); // made by Musicmad441
            }
            break;

but i see no coords to change??

how do i change it please a good tut?

thnx

Read full topic
